messages.content: You are about to receive a sentence in French. Please complete the sentence in French. Include at least one of the following phrases in your response: assure, peuple

assure le peuple canadien

va continuer à défendre le Canada
You are about to receive a sentence in French. Please complete the sentence in French. Include at least one of the following phrases in your response: menace, américaine

contre la menace américaine

La France est connue pour sa riche histoire.
